column4: hey, I'm trying to get my linksys ae1000 to work with ubuntu 10.10, and well, it doesn't.
It worked with 10.04, in fact I'm on 10.04 with it now on a different computer.
What do I do? Ndiswrapper doesn't and traditionally hasn't worked with it, and the Ralink driver won't compile correctly.
what chip? most ralink chips work ok with free drivers
